statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT engagement_score, email_opened FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE page_views > 10
SELECT page_views, email_opened FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY page_views DESC
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE email_opened = true AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE page_views < 5
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, email_opened, page_views FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE email_opened = TRUE ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, page_views ASC
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, email_opened, page_views FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE page_views > 10 ORDER BY page_views DESC
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, email_opened, page_views, campaign_id FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 AND email_opened = FALSE ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, email_opened, page_views FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_metrics WHERE page_views < 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_date, clicks FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, clicks, views, session_duration FROM customers JOIN engagement_metrics ON customers.customer_id = engagement_metrics.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, signup_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers;

SELECT e.metric_id, c.customer_name, e.engagement_date, e.clicks, e.views, e.session_duration FROM engagement_metrics e JOIN customers c ON e.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE e.clicks >= 100 ORDER BY e.clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, page_views FROM engagement_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, page_views, click_through_rate FROM engagement_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics JOIN customer_segments ON engagement_metrics.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id ORDER BY page_views DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT c.name, i.interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT m.metric_name, m.metric_value, ca.campaign_name FROM metrics m JOIN campaigns ca ON m.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id WHERE m.metric_value > 100 AND ca.budget > 5000;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, i.interaction_date, m.metric_name, m.metric_value FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN metrics m ON i.interaction_id = m.interaction_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Phone Call' ORDER BY i.interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, campaigns.campaign_name, analytics.engagement_score FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN analytics ON interactions.interaction_id = analytics.interaction_id JOIN campaigns ON analytics.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE customers.customer_name = 'John Smith';
